abstract: The European bank said that the economy of the euro zone remained resilient despite months of financial market volatility in the U.S. that now appears to be creeping into Britain.
snippet: The European bank said that the economy of the euro zone remained resilient despite months of financial market volatility in the U.S. that now appears to be creeping into Britain.
lead_paragraph: FRANKFURT  Citing a worsening outlook in Britain, the Bank of England on Thursday cut its benchmark interest rate for the second time since financial turbulence began in August.

headline.main: Britain Cuts a Key Rate, but European Bank Holds Fast
headline.print_headline: Britain Cuts a Key Rate, but European Bank Holds Fast
